resources.string: Thank you for your order. We have received this and our chefs will soon begin cooking your order
Our chefs have now completed cooking your order. Your order will be dispatched soon.
Your order is now en-route. Your delivery driver has now collected your order and they are now on they’re way to you.
Your order is now en-route. Your delivery driver has now collected your order and they are now on they’re way to you.
Your driver has confirmed your ordwer has been successfully delivered to you. We hope you enjoy your meal. Please do not forget to leave a review.
Thank you on your table reservation
Click to tell your friend now
If you need to change anything on your order please call us & quote your name
Thank you for your table reservation
Press the button to set the date

Join SUKOTHAI RESTAURANT popular loyalty programme, and it\'s free to join. You can collect points from every single time you order a take away through this app.\n \nCollect points and redeem them agaist your order at any time you please. In additon to this each time you reach a milestone you\'ll, also, receive free items and dishes along te way

Treat yourself to a meal from Sukhothai tonight and order online for collection using our mobile app or through our website. Sukhothai is a takeaway located on 50 High Street, Great Missenden, Buckinghamshire, and offering a wide range of dishes such as Mussels, Duck or Thai Curries. Take a look at our menu and choose a favourite. /n/n Order your take away, track your orders, earn loyalty points and benefit from great offers and discounts just search for the Sukhothai mobile app on Google Playstore and Apples Appstore. Dont forget to let us know if you enjoyed your meal by leaving feedback. Bon appetite!

Hey.

You should check out SUKOTHAI. 

Delicious Thai food made to order with a free delivery service. They have a cool mobile app for online
 ordering with some really great features like loyalty points, live tracking, online discounts and you received
 a £10 voucher just for reffering your friends

family.

You can download the app by searching for SUKOTHAI RESTAURANT on Google Playstore or Apples Appstore.

 Enjoy.

To track your order, view order history earn loyalty points and get special offers please enter a password for future use. It’s simple and take seconds. If you prefer not to, then simply proceed as a guest user.

Tell a friend and share the love.
 
We would love for u to tell your friends and family about our app. Just click the button below to send a text or an email.
 
When they place their first order you will both receive a £5 voucher to use against your next order.
 
Tell as many friends as you like and earn £5 every time they place their first order.
